original_title:
🚨 BREAKING: DHS is considering buying their OWN fleet of airplanes to rapidly increase the rate of deportation flights, per NBC
  — The Donald
article_summary: DHS is considering purchasing its own fleet of airplanes to increase deportation flights, sparking debate on alternative options such as borrowing from the military or repurposing decommissioned planes. Some suggest using remote piloting, amphibious ships, or even Spirit Airlines planes for deportations.</s>
